cards.title: Say something nice to your partner
cards.description: Tell your partner(s) you like them, love them, adore them, or hate them less than anyone else!
cards.reasoning: If you do this, it will make you happy.

cards.title: Go for a walk today
cards.description: Arrange your schedule in a way that you can get our for an hour today. If you have the stamina, go for a run. If not, go for a walk. Enjoy fresh air.
cards.reasoning: Moving your body is proven to improve your mood and abilities.

cards.title: Do not use SwiftUI
cards.description: It may be tempting, but it's a world of hurt!

cards.title: Don't fill in the TO field
cards.description: Every email you write today, don't fill in the TO field until you're completely done.
cards.reasoning: This will prevent you from sending the email accidentally.

cards.title: Walk Slower
cards.description: Today, walk slowly and purpusefully. Take your time getting wherever you need to get and place your steps deliverately.
cards.reasoning: When we walk slowly, we feel powerful and deliberate. And we have time to think about our destination.

cards.title: Clean up your surroundings
cards.description: Set a timer to 20 minutes and see how much you can clean up in that time.

cards.title: Go to bed early
cards.description: Today, go to bed a whole hour earlier than usual.

cards.title: Don't put it down, put it away
cards.description: Every time today you want to put something down, put it in it's actual place where it belongs.
cards.reasoning: This will reduce clutter dramatically. Maybe you'll even pick this up as a new habit.

cards.title: Give a perfect high five today
cards.description: Look at the other person's elbow while giving a high five to hit perfectly.
